text: The 11th District of the Iowa Senate is located in southwestern Iowa, and is currently composed of Adams, Cass, Pottawattamie, and Union Counties. ==Current elected officials== Tom Shipley is the senator currently representing the 11th District. The area of the 11th District contains two Iowa House of Representatives districts: *The 21st District (represented by Tom Moore) *The 22nd District (represented by Jon Jacobsen) The district is also located in Iowa's 3rd congressional district, which is represented by U.S. Representative Cindy Axne. ==Past senators== The district has previously been represented by: *John Jensen, 1983-2002 *William Dotzler, 2003-2012 *Hubert Houser, 2013-2014 *Tom Shipley, 2015-present ==See also== *Iowa General Assembly *Iowa Senate ==References== 11
title: Iowa Senate, District 11
